<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Animal Trainer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1201) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 76

**Archetype** [Animal Trainer
](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=38)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

You gain the services of a [young animal companion](/Rules.aspx?ID=151) that travels with you and obeys simple commands as best as it can. This [trained animal](AnimalCompanions.aspx) is trained in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) instead of the skill listed for its type. 

**Special** You can’t select another dedication feat until you’ve gained two other feats from the animal trainer archetype.

<title level="2">Animal Trainer Dedication leads to...</title>
[Beast Speaker](/Feats.aspx?ID=1202), [Insistent Command](/Feats.aspx?ID=1207), [Mature Trained Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1203)
